name: PSYCHOVERSE CITY - Demo
description:
DIVE INTO THE PSYCHEDELIC GRAVITY SHIFTED WORLD OF PSYCHOVERSE CITY AND PLATFORM ACROSS THE ROOFTOPS OF AN EVER-EVOLVING CITYSCAPE, ACCOMPANIED BY ADRENALINE-PUMPING BEATS!

TRAVERSE THROUGH A SERIES OF UNINTERRUPTED LEVELS, HOP AND DASH ON TOP OF WIGGLY AND TWISTY BUILDINGS. SMASH THROUGH AD-BOARDS TO GRAPPLE-HOOK UNTO FLOATING CARS. BOUNCE OFF FROM LARGE FANS AND ZIPLINE THROUGH CITY DEBRIS.

TAKE THE BEST SHOTS OF EACH SCENE WHILE TAKING COMMANDS FROM A DIRECTOR FILMING AN ADVERTISEMENT ABOUT PSYCHOVERSE CITY BASICALLY… THINK OF A MIRROR’S EDGE STYLED GAMEPLAY IN A NINJA WARRIOR COURSE WITH A LITTLE BIT OF PINK AND TRIPPINESS.

WISHLIST THE GAME ON STEAM!
JOIN THE DISCORD SERVER FOR UPDATES!
I'M ON TWITTER TOO!
